The '''Chemistry Update''' is the name for ''[[Minecraft Education|Minecraft: Education Edition]]'' version [[Education Edition 1.0.27|1.0.27]], an update that was released on February 22 to March 6, 2018.<ref>https://education.minecraft.net/?p=1105845</ref><ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004167911|title=Education Edition: Chemistry Update (1.0.27)|website=Minecraft Feedback}}</ref>

== Additions ==
{{main|Education Edition 1.0.27|Bedrock Edition 1.4.0}}

=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Compound Creator (S) BE1.png|32px]] [[Compound Creator]]'''
* Add elements to the grid and the resulting [[compound]] appears.
* There are over 30 compounds that can be created with this tool – from luminol and hydrogen peroxide to [[charcoal]] and soap.<!-- Although some recipes are outdated, the following official Minecraft chemistry journal contains information about compounds and crafting recipes: https://education.minecraft.net/wp-content/uploads/ChemistryLab_Journal.pdf -->

'''{{Animate|Purple Torch BE1.png;Blue Torch BE1.png;Green Torch BE1.png;Red Torch BE1.png|32px}} [[Colored Torch]]'''
* A new type of [[torch]].
* Available in 4 colors.

'''{{Animate| Hydrogen.png;Helium.png;Lithium.png;Beryllium.png;Boron.png;Carbon.png;Nitrogen.png;Oxygen.png;Fluorine.png;Neon.png;Sodium.png;Magnesium.png;Aluminum.png;Silicon.png;Phosphorus.png;Sulfur.png;Chlorine.png;Argon.png;Potassium.png;Calcium.png;Scandium.png;Titanium.png;Vanadium.png;Chromium.png;Manganese.png;Iron.png;Cobalt.png;Nickel.png;Copper.png;Zinc.png;Gallium.png;Germanium.png;Arsenic.png;Selenium.png;Bromine.png;Krypton.png;Rubidium.png;Strontium.png;Yttrium.png;Zirconium.png;Niobium.png;Molybdenum.png;Technetium.png;Ruthenium.png;Rhodium.png;Palladium.png;Silver.png;Cadmium.png;Indium.png;Tin.png;Antimony.png;Tellurium.png;Iodine.png;Xenon.png;Cesium.png;Barium.png;Lanthanum.png;Cerium.png;Praseodymium.png;Neodymium.png;Promethium.png;Samarium.png;Europium.png;Gadolinium.png;Terbium.png;Dysprosium.png;Holmium.png;Erbium.png;Thulium.png;Ytterbium.png;Lutetium.png;Hafnium.png;Tantalum.png;Tungsten.png;Rhenium.png;Osmium.png;Iridium.png;Platinum.png;Gold.png;Mercury.png;Thallium.png;Lead (element).png;Bismuth.png;Polonium.png;Astatine.png;Radon.png;Francium.png;Radium.png;Actinium.png;Thorium.png;Protactinium.png;Uranium.png;Neptunium.png;Plutonium.png;Americium.png;Curium.png;Berkelium.png;Californium.png;Einsteinium.png;Fermium.png;Mendelevium.png;Nobelium.png;Lawrencium.png;Rutherfordium.png;Dubnium.png;Seaborgium.png;Bohrium.png;Hassium.png;Meitnerium.png;Darmstadtium.png;Roentgenium.png;Copernicium.png;Nihonium.png;Flerovium.png;Moscovium.png;Livermorium.png;Tennessine.png;Oganesson.png; Unknown Element.png|32px}} [[Element]]'''
* A decorative block obtained from the [[element constructor]] and [[material reducer]].
* Used as ingredients for some recipes.

'''[[File:Element Constructor (S) BE1.png|32px]] [[Element Constructor]]'''
* Allows the [[player]] to create [[element]]s based on their atomic structure with sliders to choose the number of protons, electrons, and neutrons.
* Uses 118 elements from the [[wikipedia:Periodic table|Periodic Table]] as well as over 400 stable isotopes.

'''{{Animate|Hardened Glass BE1.png;Hardened White Stained Glass BE1.png;Hardened Light Gray Stained Glass BE1.png;Hardened Gray Stained Glass BE1.png;Hardened Black Stained Glass BE1.png;Hardened Brown Stained Glass BE1.png;Hardened Red Stained Glass BE1.png;Hardened Orange Stained Glass BE1.png;Hardened Yellow Stained Glass BE1.png; Hardened Lime Stained Glass BE1.png;Hardened Green Stained Glass BE1.png;Hardened Cyan Stained Glass BE1.png;Hardened Light Blue Stained Glass BE1.png;Hardened Blue Stained Glass BE1.png;Hardened Purple Stained Glass BE1.png;Hardened Magenta Stained Glass BE1.png;Hardened Pink Stained Glass BE1.png|32px}} [[Hardened Glass]] and [[Hardened Stained Glass]]'''
* A chemically hardened [[glass]].

'''{{Animate|Hardened Glass Pane BE1.png;Hardened White Stained Glass Pane BE1.png;Hardened Light Gray Stained Glass Pane BE1.png;Hardened Gray Stained Glass Pane BE1.png;Hardened Black Stained Glass Pane BE1.png;Hardened Brown Stained Glass Pane BE1.png;Hardened Red Stained Glass Pane BE1.png;Hardened Orange Stained Glass Pane BE1.png;Hardened Yellow Stained Glass Pane BE1.png; Hardened Lime Stained Glass Pane BE1.png;Hardened Green Stained Glass Pane BE1.png;Hardened Cyan Stained Glass Pane BE1.png;Hardened Light Blue Stained Glass Pane BE1.png;Hardened Blue Stained Glass Pane BE1.png;Hardened Purple Stained Glass Pane BE1.png;Hardened Magenta Stained Glass Pane BE1.png;Hardened Pink Stained Glass Pane BE1.png|32px}} [[Hardened Glass Pane]] and [[Hardened Stained Glass Pane]]'''
* A chemically hardened [[glass pane]].

'''[[File:Heat Block (animated) BE1.png|32px]] [[Heat Block]]''' 
* A block that can melt snow and ice like a torch, but it does not give off light.

'''[[File:Lab Table (S) BE1.png|32px]] [[Lab Table]]'''
* Allows for the creation of items by combining elements and compounds in a grid.
* For example, adding [[Compound#Water|water]] and [[Compound#Sodium Hypochlorite|sodium hypochlorite]] makes [[bleach]], which a player can use to turn wool white.

'''[[File:Material Reducer (S) BE1.png|32px]] [[Material Reducer]]'''
* It reduces a [[block]] to its component elements, providing a useful way to explore the elements that make up the real world environment.
* Since some blocks in ''[[Minecraft]]'' do not exist in the natural world, there is a "???" element for these as well to encourage curiosity of learners.

'''[[File:Underwater TNT BE1.png|32px]] [[Underwater TNT]]'''
* A underwater variant of the [[TNT]].
* Can destroy blocks underwater.

'''[[File:Underwater Torch BE1.png|32px]] [[Underwater Torch]]'''
* A underwater variant of the torch.
* Can be placed underwater.

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Bleach BE1.png|32px]] [[Bleach]]'''
* Can be used to remove dye from [[wool]].

'''{{Animate|Beaker BE1.png;White Beaker BE1.png;Black Beaker BE1.png;Blue Beaker BE1.png;Yellow Beaker BE1.png;Blue Beaker BE1.png;Jar BE1.png;White Jar BE1.png;Light Gray Jar BE1.png;Black Jar BE1.png;Brown Jar BE1.png;Yellow Jar BE1.png;Glue BE1.png;Salt BE1.png;Garbage BE1.png|32px}} [[Compound]]'''
* Items obtained from the compound creator.

'''{{Animate|White Glow Stick.png;Gray Glow Stick.png;Brown Glow Stick.png;Red Glow Stick.png;Orange Glow Stick.png;Yellow Glow Stick.png;Lime Glow Stick.png;Green Glow Stick.png;Cyan Glow Stick.png;Light Blue Glow Stick.png;Blue Glow Stick.png;Purple Glow Stick.png;Magenta Glow Stick.png;Pink Glow Stick.png|32px}} [[Glow Stick]]'''
* Can be lit up in the [[player]]'s hand for a limited time.

'''[[File:Ice Bomb BE1.png|32px]] [[Ice Bomb]]'''
* Can be thrown and turn water into ice chunks. 

'''[[Medicine]]'''
* Each medicine can remove specific effects.
** [[File:Antidote BE1.png|32px]] Antidote cures [[poison]].
** [[File:Elixir BE1.png|32px]] Elixir cures [[weakness]].
** [[File:Eye Drops BE1.png|32px]] Eye Drops cures [[blindness]].
** [[File:Tonic BE1.png|32px]] Tonic cures [[nausea]].

'''{{Animate|Purple Sparkler BE1.png;Blue Sparkler BE1.png; Green Sparkler BE1.png;Red Sparkler BE1.png;Orange Sparkler BE1.png|32px}} [[Sparkler]]'''
* Can be lit up in the [[player]]'s hand for a limited time.

'''[[File:Super Fertilizer BE1.png|32px]] [[Super Fertilizer]]'''
* Can make grow [[saplings]] and [[crops]] faster.
